title: Ticket #840: Windows Condor installer requires HDFS mode when HDFS is disabled
description: When installing Condor 7.3.2 on Windoze, if the "Enable HDFS support" radio button is left as "No", after clicking "Next", a error modal alert declares "You must enter a value into this field!" with a title "Select HDFS Mode".
check_ins: 2009-Oct-14 16:57   Check-in [16056]: Fix bug where Windows installer wouldn't let you advance if you did not enable HDFS. Ticket #840. (By Ziliang Guo )
creator: nleroy
